message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you, so I think this is a fair price. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $10,500? This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.
